name: claude-experiments
description: A curated marketplace for Claude Code optimization plugins featuring state machine-based prompt optimization

plugins.name: meta-prompt
plugins.description: State machine-based optimization infrastructure achieving 40-60% token reduction through deterministic preprocessing, template-based routing, and specialized LLM agents. Features 7 pre-built templates, intelligent hybrid classification (90%+ accuracy), and zero-token orchestration with domain-specific skills layer.
